PIE_Standalone: A standalone game will be started. This will not create a dedicated server, nor automatically connect to one. A server can be launched by enabling bLaunchSeparateServer if you need to test offline -> server connection flow for your game.
PIE_ListenServer: The editor will act as both a Server and a Client. Additional instances may be opened beyond that depending on the number of clients.
PIE_Client: The editor will act as a Client. A server will be started for you behind the scenes to connect to.
